sentences.en: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.cn: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.en: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.cn: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.en: Apply a dressing to the wound and bandage it.
sentences.cn: 给伤口盖上敷料并用绷带包扎起来。

sentences.en: Blood began to coagulate around the edges of the wound.
sentences.cn: 血液开始在伤口的边缘凝固。

sentences.en: Both partners of the marriage wound up unhappy.
sentences.cn: 最后婚姻双方都不幸福。

sentences.en: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.cn: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

sentences.en: He explored the wound with his finger, trying to establish its extent.
sentences.cn: 他用手指摸了摸伤口，想要确定受伤的程度。

sentences.en: He had six stitches in a head wound.
sentences.cn: 他头上的伤口缝了6针。

sentences.en: I wound up the watch and listened to it tick.
sentences.cn: 我给表上紧发条，听着它嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.cn: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.en: Press firmly on the wound to stop the bleeding.
sentences.cn: 用力压住伤口止血。

sentences.en: She displayed her wound to the twelve gentlemen of the jury.
sentences.cn: 她给陪审团的12位男士看了她的伤口。

sentences.en: The boy was treated for a minor head wound.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩因头部轻伤接受了治疗。

sentences.en: The convoy wound its way through the West Bank.
sentences.cn: 车队曲曲折折地穿过约旦河西岸。

sentences.en: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.cn: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.en: The other injured man had a superficial stomach wound.
sentences.cn: 另一名受伤男子是腹部的皮外伤。

sentences.en: The queues at the door wound around the building.
sentences.cn: 门口的队伍绕了大楼一圈。

sentences.en: The right thing would be to apply direct pressure to the wound.
sentences.cn: 正确的做法是直接按住伤口。

sentences.en: The wound is festering, and gangrene has set in.
sentences.cn: 伤口在溃烂，已经生了坏疽。

sentences.en: The wound is healing nicely.
sentences.cn: 伤口愈合得很好。
